item.title: Cascade and Parallel Combination (CPC) of Adaptive Filters for Estimating Heart Rate during Intensive Physical Exercise from Photoplethysmographic Signal
Abnormality Detection and Localization in Chest X-Rays using Deep Convolutional Neural Networks
A Time-Frequency Domain Approach of Heart Rate Estimation From Photoplethysmographic (PPG) Signal
An Efficient Method for Heart Rate Monitoring using Wrist-type Photoplethysmographic Signals During Intensive Physical Exercise
PPG: Heart Rate Estimation
item.description:
In this research, we have developed algorithms for estimating heart rate from photoplethysmographic (PPG) signals under heavy noise.

We focused our research on adaptive filters and signal decomposition methods.

item.title: Mixed Gaussian-Impulse Noise Reduction from Images Using Convolutional Neural Network
